alert.note: Alert for Prowers (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 13 at 4:28PM MDT until June 13 at 5:00PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: The National Weather Service in Pueblo has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Prowers County in southeastern Colorado... * Until 500 PM MDT. * At 427 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Granada, or 15 miles west of Coolidge, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Hartman around 440 PM MDT. Holly around 445 PM MDT. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
